value:
$WmMPID_アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Normal,Face|Come on, Bernie! The war council
is starting and we need to be there!$k$p$WmMPID_リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Normal,Face|Would you listen to reason, please?
We're extremely tired of waiting.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hello, ladies. Is something amiss?$k$pWhat is it about this door that is
causing such consternation?$k$p$WmMPID_リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Normal,Face|Bernadetta refuses to leave her room,
Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Normal,Face|I have business with my room. Lots
to, um, talk about? It'll be a while,
so...go away, please! Thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Normal,Face|We're open to suggestions, Prince
Alfonse, if you have any ideas.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If friends from her own world are at
a loss, I hardly see how anything
I come up with could be of use.$k$pHow would the class leaders at your
academy deal with such an issue?$k$p$WmMPID_フェルディナント,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Normal,Face|Did someone say class leader? Stand
back, everyone. I am Ferdinand von
Aegir, and I will handle this!$k$pOnly I possess the knowledge of
Edelgard necessary to predict her
every move. Prepare yourselves!$k$p$WmMPID_アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Normal,Face|I'm not sure where this is going, but
I do like your confidence!$k$p$WmMPID_リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Normal,Face|I have my doubts, but considering we
were getting nowhere by doing it our
way, I say we let him work.$k$pHear that, Bernadetta? Ferdinand's
new plan is going to have you out
of there in very short order.$k$p$WmMPID_ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Normal,Face|You think you can out-scheme me in
my own area of expertise?! Bring it!
I'm a FIVE-STAR RECLUSE!$k$p
